projects.name: E-commerce (WIP)
projects.description: A E-commerce web page still in development. A webpage involving a shopping cart with each unique tabs for each section

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Weather App containing a searchable zipcode for a location's weather displaying a 24 hour weather forecast and 3 day forecast from a free weather API.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Simple Calculator able to clear, change sign, percent, and simple operation.

projects.name: Etch-A-Sketch
projects.description: A recreation of a Etch-A-Sketch on a web page able to change size of grid, draw, erase, and clear the grid.

projects.name: Image-slider
projects.description: Simple image-slider mini project implementing a slider alongside a shift of each image following the cursor and a hover effect.
